ValidationRule.description: subs end date cant greater than start date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "API" ), not CONTAINS( $Profile.Name, "Admin" ), HAPP_Contract_Start_Date__c > HAPP_Contract_End_Date__c, $RecordType.Name == 'BGA AM', $RecordType.Name == 'BGA AM Short Cycle', NOT(ISBLANK(HAPP_Contract_Start_Date__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(HAPP_Contract_End_Date__c)) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Contract Start Date cannot greater than Contract End Date.
